text: David Škoch (born 6 November 1976) is a professional doubles tennis player from the Czech Republic. He was the Wimbledon boys' singles champion in 1992. In 2012-2019 he played in ITF tournaments with Petr Nouza, recently in May 2019 in Jablonec nad Nisou. In July 2019 he took 838 in ATP doubles ranking, after Leander Paes and Nenad Zimonjić he is the third oldest player on the circuit and the oldest active Czech professional tennis player. ==ATP career
